page.title: 06PARK NORTH EAST SWINDON
page.content: Park North is a{residential}area.There is a mixture of all kinds of housing, but the majority of houses are terraced.Quite a lot of the houses and flats are rented from the council and there are a few bungalows for{older {people}looked after by a part time {warden}.A lot of the houses and flats are in need of{redecoration. In nearly every road there are grass verges or small grassed areas and a lot of trees.This makes the area a pleasant place to live in.There are two large{grassed areas}and one childrens{playground}.There is only one shop selling sweets,groceries and tobacco.The customers sometimes go there several times a day to shop and to chat to there friends.Most of the population never go to{church},and only a handful go regularly.
